channel.title: Adding defence and Prayer
channel.description:
Mkay here they are...
I need help making..
Prayer work, say you turn on Melee protect and the npcs will only hit 0 on you. I need help making it drain too. My prayer is completely defective. :( Also i'v looked through topics and only one on rune-server has been posted and its no help.
Examples: Turning on a str pray and its like I'm super potting, just doesn't show up on your stats. Turning on Melee Pro and getting hit less/not at all by npcs.
Making defense work correctly is the most important. I asked PaliDino but iether he wants to keep secret or he has no time to explain, but I need defense to correctly work. Say i'm wearing full bandos.. From then on I'll get hit high 60% less than when I have no armor.
If you can help me with these two things my email is John_95_07@hotmail.com
These is my only two big problems atm.

item.title: Adding defence and Prayer

item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

Mkay here they are…

I need help making…

Prayer work, say you turn on Melee protect and the npcs will only hit 0 on you. I need help making it drain too. My prayer is completely defective. Also i’v looked through topics and only one on rune-server has been posted and its no help.

Examples:
Turning on a str pray and its like I’m super potting, just doesn’t show up on your stats.
Turning on Melee Pro and getting hit less/not at all by npcs.

Making defense work correctly is the most important. I asked PaliDino but iether he wants to keep secret or he has no time to explain, but I need defense to correctly work. Say i’m wearing full bandos… From then on I’ll get hit high 60% less than when I have no armor.

These is my only two big problems atm.
